skills.title: Soft skills
skills.paragraph: Kanban, Time management, Deep listening. I'm familiar with scrum and agile methodologies and I apply the kanban method on a daily basis for my work and daily routine. I've been working to improve my soft skills as well. I completed a couple of online courses about Deep listening at udemy and such other platforms. I'm certain this had a positive effect on my teamwork skills.
